comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: There is now a simple Java 1.4 build http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/job/Jackrabbit-trunk-java14/ that is automatically executed after all successful Java 1.5 builds of Jackrabbit trunk. This is a workaround, but should achieve the goal of automatically alerting us whenever Java 1.5 features creep in the codebase.

description: Due to the fact that the Maven 2 support in Hudson only works on Java 5, our current CI build at http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/job/Jackrabbit-trunk/ doesn't detect references to classes and methods that are only available in the Java 5 class library.
summary: Hudson build doesn't detect Java 5 class references
